casebody.data:
Henry STERN, Plaintiff Appellant, v. Max ALPERN, Defendant Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 17, 1928. No. 93. Ivan Konigsberg, of New York City, for appellant. Dyke & Schaines, of New York City (Herbert H. Dyke, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
